ExampleDefinition.Title: Multi-Pane Stock Charts
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Using the SciChartGroup and SciStockChart control, create's a static multi-pane stock chart with Indicator and Volume panes
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Multi-Pane Stock Charts</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">An MVVM example which demonstrates creating a static multi-panel stock chart with Volume and Indicator panes.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Interactivity Options</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Switch from OHLC to Candlestick chart.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Select Pan or Zoom mode.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Zoom to extents via button or double-clicking on the chart.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Drag XAxis and YAxis to scale.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Hover to see XY cursor values.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Change theme of the chart via the drop-down menu.</Run>
